title: Making Great Code Greater
discription: How thinking about architecture can take your code to the next level! Think about an abstraction that generalizes the problem you're trying to solve. Perhaps there exists a design pattern that solves your specific problem.

title: Staying Quiet is Quite Unacceptable
discription: As a white person, let alone a white man, I have benefited in ways that I will never be able to comprehend. It’s impossible to comprehend your privilege, because it’s impossible to experience life without it.

title: Recall — UI/UX Case Study of Safari Reading List
discription: A UX Case Study on Safari Reading List and how we could make it better.
